description.lang: The Dimmer Actuator is used for switching on, switching off or dimming one or more connected loads. Further Highlights of the Dimmer Actuator are: The smallest z-wave dimmer actuator Measuring power and energy Usage as a switch, e.g., actuating a motor Remote controlling of further actuators / Z-Wave device Control via buttons and switches possible Easy configuration with tactile button Integrated signal LED VDE-approved
